storyInfo: The old tailor dies before Red's eyes. Ingrid kills the true culprit, Venezia Junior. Lappland and Texas make a bet on whether the parade will arrive to a sea of blood. Both mafiosi and truck drivers grab weapons. Tensions run high when a shot rings out.

attributes.content: Are you awake, pup?
I don't know what's sadder for Umberto: To slowly waste away from age and illness, or to watch how his pups get dumber with each generation.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: How sad and pathetic, humans.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Y-You're—
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: The memory is blurry, but Luchino remembers the voice.
The night that Umberto brought him back to Tailor de Montano...
Sitting on a chair, Luchino looked blankly at the unfamiliar room before him, filled with various fabrics and tools.
Umberto was outside talking to someone. Suddenly, he turns around, and through the window Luchino thought Umberto was showing him to someone else, but does not see who it is.
His grandfather, his only living relation. Luchino feels his stomach churn with nervousness.
Then, he hears a voice mixed with anger and resignation exclaim, 'Shameless human! Up to the same old tricks again!'
Are you nonno's... friend?
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Friend?
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Friend, teacher, master, employer, client... my relationship with Umberto is not so easily defined.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: I am the master of these wilds, pup, and your grandfather is my Fang.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: A most incompetent one, I might add...
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Guess I'm really getting old.
attributes.name: Umberto
Umberto
attributes.content: No matter how long I sat by the worktable, the nights never felt this long...

attributes.name: Umberto
attributes.content: And I would have noticed you coming in. When?
attributes.joined: No matter how long I sat by the worktable, the nights never felt this long...And I would have noticed you coming in. When?

attributes.content: Ten minutes ago.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Do you mind if I kept working while we talked?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I was delayed by an old friend's unexpected visit. I must hurry and finish the most important work on this suit.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Luchino can take care of the final touch-ups himself.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I smell no scent of wolf from you, even a little bit.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Nor have you masked it in any unusual way. I was watching, I can tell.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: ...Are you really the last true wolf?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: True wolf? Ah, you mean the Fangs.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Yes, you've come to the right place, young one.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I observed Umberto for a long time.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: I watched him serve customers of every kind, casually putting his scissors through some of their throats while taking measurement, without getting a single drop of blood on himself.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: He was not a warrior, like Ingrid, but he was smart and knew how to make the most of who he was.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: He was also good at disguising himself. He spent most of his time in Tailor de Montano, and he was equally in demand as a tailor as he was as an assassin.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: That's why I chose him. I told him about the Signori dei Lupi, and the existence of the game.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Nonno's stories were true!
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: You're the wolf from the stories... no wonder he wanted to leave the famiglia. He was the Signore dei Lupi's chosen, the most special tailor in Siracusa. He sure is very lucid!
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Did nonno accept your deal?
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: No Fang can reject the Signori dei Lupi.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: But Umberto set a condition.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: C-Condition?
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: He was not the first Fang to try to bargain with the Signori dei Lupi. Impertinent fools! I know a hundred ways to destroy them and find someone else to take their place.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: What did nonno want to do?
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Umberto wanted to raise his pup to adulthood, before delivering my victory.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: His wife had passed away, he said, and his young pup, Luca, was too young to survive without him.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: That was it?
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: That was it. I agreed.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: The society of humans was no more dangerous than the wilderness. I did not imagine it would take up so much of his time and energy.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: I visited the tailor's shop from time to time to make sure he was not deceiving me.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: That day, Umberto shut down his assassination business, devoting all his time to the sewing machine, fabric, and the young pup as it grew.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: But his hands were still steady, and his eyes still sharp. Therefore, I kept my promise.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: I needed a Fang that would not break, not easily-distracted prey. I gave him time. I had plenty of it.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: But papa...
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Died meaninglessly.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: I gave Umberto plenty of time to recover from the shock.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: It may not have been how Umberto planned it, but at least now he was no longer burdened. And so one night I visited him again, and demanded that he hold up his end of the bargain.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: But my Fang once again bargained with me—
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: The Signore dei Lupi pauses and glares at the young tailor before him.
Do you mean...
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: He learned that his pup had a pup of its own, the last family he had... He wanted to raise you to adulthood too, before the hunt begins.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: 'Shameless human! Up to the same old tricks again!'
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: That was you...
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: This time, I did not assent. But he seems to have forgotten who he was, and who I was to him!
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Every time I pressed him, he babbles something like how life keeps repeating itself, while shamelessly promising that he will hold up his end of the bargain.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: But nonno was never in good health, as long as I could remember.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: My Fang could hardly defend himself now, much less deliver my victory.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: The only result of my patience was that he had grown old.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Nonno actually—
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: I know he's only ever cared about his shop, the suits he made, and the people he loved.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: That's why he did those things, which he was never made for... Umberto was a fool. I was wrong about him.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Why are you telling me all this, Signore dei Lupi?
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: All my effort and patience have only earned me an eternity of scorn from the pack for breaking the rules of the game.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: You are his pup. Now you must face punishment.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: P-Punishment...
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: All your efforts tonight will be futile, whether you are trying to destroy the weapons, or destroy the ship.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Look down at your chest...
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Luchino looks down and sees that the front of his jacket has flown open. He must have dropped his button in the chaos.
Whatever you want to become, pup, learn to sew your own buttons first.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Now, get lost. Go back to Umberto!
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: You are a terrible actor, Vargo.
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: That mock anger... were you afraid we would harm that pup?
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: He was not part of the game—
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Have you forgotten the decision of the pack, Vargo?
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: The Signori dei Lupi shall stay here until this round is decided, and shall not intervene in any manner, or else...
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: I've already lost, Caesar.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: The silvery Signore dei Lupi suddenly looks up.
He casts his gaze towards a corner of the city, a city engulfed in revelry, the night sky bright as day. No one notices that a certain cloud has dispersed.
The wind brings a familiar scent. Red has done her work.
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: I won't be shameless like Zaaro, Caesar. I have gone against the decision of the pack, and I shall accept my punishment.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: Are you mourning your Fang?
attributes.name: Caesar

attributes.content: Just bitter about losing.
attributes.name: Vargo

attributes.content: I wouldn't have found you without grandma's help.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Grandma?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: That's how you call your wolf? I've never thought of them as being particularly kindly...
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: But then, Vargo must have figured out a long time ago that he was being deceived. There's a soft heart there, underneath the surface.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: You won't resist either?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Either?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: The last true wolf that I killed didn't resist.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: She just watched me pierce her chest as she cuddled her limp leg.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: She sighed and muttered, 'Finally, no need to live in fear anymore...'
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Sounds like death was a relief to her.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Well, it's not as if I stood any chance if I tried to resist. Besides, I don't mind this chat going on for a while longer. It would ruin this new suit if we started fighting right now.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Phew—almost there.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Measure, cut, shape, trim... that's how plain cloth becomes stylish clothes.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: There are about four hundreds and fifty steps to a standard Siracusa suit, but it doesn't take as much time as one might think, if you go about them step by step, calmly and patiently.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: The sound of the sewing machine stops.
The old tailor trims away the protruding threads, gets up from his chair, and walks by the huntress to hang the new suit on the wall.
He sighs, rubs his swollen eyes, and lies down on a sofa in a corner.
Do you mind if I lie down? At this age, I get dizzy whenever I work for an extended period of time.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Grandma was right. True wolves are good at disguising themselves.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I do not understand why you don't smell of wolf, but it doesn't change what you did to grandma.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: You ate grandma's eyes, arms and heart...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Answer me, true wolf. Why do you engage in such a cruel game?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I see. That's how you understand the game to be like.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I take it you asked the last Fang you killed the same question.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I don't have an answer either, young one. We were all chosen by fate, by happenstance.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Whether it is lies or the truth that accompanies us, however, all of it will converge upon a single end... What will you do when that time comes?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Find the other true wolf who escaped me.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Her bow is weak. She is no match for me.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: No, what I mean is, what happens when you've killed all the true wolves?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: The game ends, and grandma is saved.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: *Cough* And what about you? Where will you go from there? What will you do?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Have you been seeking out and killing true wolves all this time?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: (Waggles ears)
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: No. I was helping Kal'tsit. There are many things at Rhodes Island that I need to do...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: The huntress bows her head.
I have wasted too much time.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: The cold glint of a dagger shines out of Red's sleeves. She had been holding it all this time.
You're not afraid, true wolf?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Of course I'm afraid. I always am, whether you're here or not.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: My health has been in a steady decline for a long time. You can't help but be afraid when you know that you don't have much time left.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: But at least I was not like the one you spoke of, who spent a long time waiting for death's visit... that's much scarier than death.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Come to think of it, I didn't really achieve anything in my life.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: A killer who racked up a mountain of blood debts, a father who watched his son die, a grandfather who doesn't know how to teach his grandson, a Fang who never played the game—
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: But I was a good tailor, a lucky old man.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: How many can say that they were doing the work they loved on their deathbed?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I'll leave the finishing touch to you, Luchino...
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Red does not raise her dagger. She does not need to.
The old man on the sofa is no longer breathing, as though he had expended his last bit of strength to finish the suit.
Red gazes unblinkingly at the old man's face.
She had seen the deaths of many, all of whom had died with an expression like a mask on their faces.
Even the limp true wolf that was waiting for death had terror on her face when Red came in, which only changed to relief in her final moments.
As for the Reunion members in the Lungmen ruins, and those who invaded Rhodes Island, their faces were twisted from rage or fear.

But the expression on the face of the old man before her never changed, from the moment she walked into the Tailor de Montano, to this very instant. Red was finally certain that he was not disguising himself.
Was the man really who grandma said he was?
The true wolf died before the huntress, but not by the huntress' hand.
Doubt fills Red's heart.
'Where will you go from there? What will you do?'
I don't understand, Grandma...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: <p=1>Fifteen minutes until parade arrives at Court Square</><p=2>November 9th, 1100    11:30 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Seems like you hate Siracusa even more than I do.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Ha, you think I'm doing this for revenge?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: No?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I've already said goodbye to my past, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Maybe there wasn't a formal ceremony, but that doesn't make it any less serious.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I didn't tell you how I became a taxi driver, did I?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I never asked.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hahahaha.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Zaaro and I came across this pile of scrap metal in the wilderness—
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The two of you got together?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Not many people would interrupt me like this, you know—yes, he's my lackey now.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: A few Siracusans came to Nuova Volsinii together, but started brawling out in the wilderness for no reason, and the car ended up in front of me.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Siracusa invited, so I had to answer, just like you had to return to Volsinii last year.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Are you absolutely sure you're not just recalling the plot of a radio program?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Hey, I would be happy to sell the story to a radio station or filmmaker. I think it'll make a good road movie.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: One year ago, I was sitting at that table in the Grey Hall with you when you won this new nomadic city from that Befana Sicilia.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You could call me one of the startup investors in this youthful dream of a new Siracusa.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Of course I needed to be here at the one-year anniversary of Nuova Volsinii, to celebrate with my friends!
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You know, I think I deserve some gratitude for all the problems I dealt with behind the scenes to make sure the festival proceeds without a hitch.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Like scattering weapons across the square?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Haha, much more than just that.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Such as?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Such as my dear father, who is quite, let's say, ambitious about his plans for the new city.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I thought Alberto was in custody.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Oh, come on, haven't you spent enough time in my family to know what a stronzo the Saluzzo don is?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: He wouldn't tolerate the thought of anything being outside his control, despite his failure at Volsinii, despite the vigilance of Nuova Volsinii's City Hall and courts against his interference.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What did you do?
attributes.name: Texas
Lappland
attributes.content: Took a few things out of his control, that's all...

attributes.name: Lappland
attributes.content: You'll find out soon enough.
attributes.joined: Took a few things out of his control, that's all...You'll find out soon enough.

attributes.content: Are you SURE you're not doing this for revenge?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Well, I guess that's a matter of interpretation.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Oh, and these masked dudes on the square. You remember seeing their boss, that cheerful Perro, in court?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Venezia Junior...
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: It's often those who despise the game the most who understand the rules most thoroughly.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: He and his Venezia Trucking have never been in violation of the New Urban Management Act. As a matter of fact, he is a two-time winner of the Outstanding Young Entrepreneur award...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: He might hate Siracusa more than either of us, Texas, but he know how to read the winds better than most wolves.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: But what?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: I don't like his hairstyle. Too oily.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I prefer Vulpos who aren't so much like wolves.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: A Vulpo mother from a distant land, who returned to Siracusa to seek justice for her Oripathy-afflicted daughter... Touching story, isn't it?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Besides, I happened to know that mother.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: What did you do this time?
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: Helped her find the culprit. Super easy, barely any inconvenience.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I'm sure you would have done the same.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Sounds like the City Hall should give you a medal for outstanding citizenship.
attributes.name: Texas

attributes.content: What better time to do that than tonight? You can do the honors.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Nah, it wouldn't sit well with my conscience.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: After all, things have gotten to the point where they are, even with all the 'business' that I threw a wrench into.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Now, let's get back to that wager.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Two packs of wolves, increasingly antsy... the end is approaching, Texas.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: <p=1>Ten minutes until parade arrives at Court Square</><p=2>November 9th, 1100    11:35 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: ...I'm glad you're here, Ingrid.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: The White Wolf of Saluzzo has disrupted our plans. I'm going to the port to deal with matters, lest she ruin everything that Venezia has built in Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I returned my emblem a long time ago. Whatever happens to the famiglia is none of my business.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Drop the act, Antonio. You know why I'm here.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: How did you know it was me?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: When you told me you knew the truth.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: But it was your reaction just now that removed the last vestige of doubt.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Why did you think the Sicilian betrayed you the moment you saw me?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Ah. You tricked me.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Did I?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I had my suspicions, Antonio. If the Tancredis wanted to assassinate the Venezia don, doing it through a child was a highly unreliable method, to say the least...
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: No matter how intricate their plan was, they could not possibly have prepared a doll that Lisa had only fallen in love with half a month ago because of a movie.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: There never was an assassination attempt. You hurt Lisa to agitate me, in order to run me out of the famiglia.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: If that was so—
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Oh, you spared no expenses to make sure that Lisa wanted for nothing when I brought her back. She called you the 'really nice Perro uncle'.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: And the way you beseeched me to come home, after I arrived in Nuova Volsinii...
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You wore your mask perfectly, Antonio. You put on such a natural act that it would put the real thing to shame.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: No, no, it was all real.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Lisa. Lovely, clever child. I was happy from the bottom of my heart when she called me uncle.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: But you were in my way, Ingrid.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I could never have risen in the familglia with you around, much less rise to my present position.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: The struggle between Venezia and Tancredi had reached the point where nothing was off-limits. It was a chance I could not afford to miss. Lisa was your only weakness.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: As for why I tried to bring you back after chasing you out from the famiglia, the answer is even simpler...
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Times have changed, Ingrid. Be it within the famiglia, or in Nuova Volsinii, Venezia Junior needs a strong right hand.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I even made preparations to sponsor Rhodes Island under the name of Venezia Trucking, in order to allow them to devote their full effort to Lisa's treatment.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: The Don took us in, and we lived together as Venezia for more than a decade. But somehow, you have it in you to hurt the people closest to you—
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Are you going to chastise me for lacking in 'decency', Ingrid?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I'm curious: Do you truly agree with what the old man says, or are you just playing dumb?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: We keep emphasizing 'decency,' acting like we're principled, pretending we're filled with love, and claiming we're so different from the other famiglia!
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: But we're no different, are we? Just a bunch of stronzo with blood all over our hands.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: That tailor, Umberto. He's done dirty work after dirty work for the old man, just because he owed the old man one back in the day.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: If decency was really about the famiglia, why did he leave the famiglia to focus on his suits?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: That scar on your face. Is it a mark of honor, or shame? Behind the scar, how many lives were taken in the name of the famiglia?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Who's really decent in this swamp they call Siracusa?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: No one amongst us, at least.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Good. This is the right distance for stabbing.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You really are forthright, Antonio.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I just believe we shouldn't expect something unrealistic from one another.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: What the Siracusans should do is be prepared to lose everything, including those they love the most. That's what I used to admire you for.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: A bright flash of light.
The alley they are in is separated from Court Square by a high wall. Only a few dim street lamps illuminate the dark street. The sudden flash of light dazzles Ingrid momentarily.
This is your Arts? You hid it well.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Doesn't do much, except cause a strong flash of light... it even looks a little silly, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: This is the second time I've ever used it. Without this light, I would not have dodged that bullet while kneeling in the mud of the jungle.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: I would not have been able to hold that drunken noble who circled our names away from the list, before cutting his head off.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: Anger and distract me with that speech you just gave, then create an opening with the flash—you planned this the moment you saw me, didn't you?
attributes.name: Ingrid
Antonio
attributes.content: *Cough*— Ugh—

attributes.name: Antonio
attributes.content: But all my knife found was the omamori you wore on your belt...
attributes.joined: *Cough*— Ugh—But all my knife found was the omamori you wore on your belt...

attributes.content: You never had a chance, Antonio, the moment I found out what kind of person you are.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You know, it's funny, I was actually trying to think of an excuse to spare your life on my way here.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Lisa's condition can never be cured, but she has found friends at Rhodes Island, even became an operator for them, working to help other Oripathy patients.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I was worried about Lisa's education, but life has thrown her a bone by the strange deliverance of fate—
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Sorella! Ingrid Venezia! You will insult me with this 'decency', even now?
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You would never have missed my heart if you didn't mean to—*cough*—I shouldn't still be talking.
attributes.name: Antonio

attributes.content: You're mistaken.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: It's just plain Ingrid. A mother whom you've angered.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: If I was thinking about decency... it was only so that you wouldn't die with any.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I left you alive so that you could bleed to death.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You deserve the pain, Antonio.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Another firework explodes in the skies not far from here, casting its light on Ingrid's face. The parade is about to arrive at the square. Carnevale comes to a climax.
It will be a long time before they find out about the Perro lying on the other side of the wall. Ingrid snickers at the thought.
She walks over the figure lying on the ground and leaves the alley.
<p=1>Four minutes until parade arrives at Court Square</><p=2>November 9th, 1100    11:41 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: I still can't get in touch with Antonio! What the hell is going on?
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: And where's Capone at a time like this? I knew you couldn't trust a Sicilian.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: What do we do now?
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: What do you THINK we do? This ain't a movie when you just call 'Cut!' and go to lunch.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Everything has been exposed. City Hall sees us for who we are now. Do you think we can go back to being 'honest citizens of Nuova Volsinii' after this?
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Complete Antonio's mission, capture the courthouse, then get in touch with the port.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Do the reinforcements have their weapons?
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Mafioso B

attributes.content: Good. On my order.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Maybe some of us haven't touched a weapon in a year, but we ain't any more out of practice than these cargo-hauling scemo.
attributes.name: Mafioso A

attributes.content: Eirene...
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: You have the answer?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: It's not the one we want to hear, is it?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Tell Eirene that I'm very sorry about Sommer...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But I will not sign this verdict, and this decision is final.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii will not tolerate the crimes of the mafia, but that doesn't mean other people can use the opportunity to achieve their own goals.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I've gotten letters from many friends over the past year. Some of them are judges or lawyers in other cities; others have chosen to pursue a different career.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: They shared a lot of advice with me, about the jurisprudential basis of the New Urban Management Act, and specific room for improvement.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I read many feelings between the lines. Concern, confusion, hope, even envy...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The New Urban Management Act is a unique thing in Siracusa. It is the basis of this city's existence. Many have their eyes upon it; even more have sacrificed for it.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's true that it can be powerless at times. But it's especially in times like this that I cannot allow it to become empty words, much less a tool to be exploited.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Still the same old Lavinia.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Hey, Eirene.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Listen to me carefully.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: These people have gotten their hands on weapons. They have become true wolves. The situation is out of control.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I saw what the mafiosi are capable of when I first came to Siracusa as a kid. They slaughtered my uncle's entire family in just half an hour.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: In a few moments I will release smoke to obstruct their view. Get the guys out of here when that happens. Hand signs, signals, whatever, I know you have a way.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: You'll need to be quick. I've never released smoke in such a large area before, so I don't know how well it will work, or how long I can keep it up.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: The trucks are right behind us. Get in, get away.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I wasn't with Sommer that night. It's partly my fault that he's dead...
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: There's no much that a luckless loner like me can do, but I can't let my brothers and sisters die here.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: That's a gun, not a spanner! Stop pointing it at me—
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: No, I don't mean point it at yourself!
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: B-But I don't know how to use it...
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: Then point it in front of you, Pedro.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: But that's—
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Don't worry about it going off, or accidentally touching the switch on some Arts unit.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I've talked to Judge Lavinia. These mafiosi have been declared outlaws under the New Urban Management Act...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: No one is going to hold you responsible if you accidentally shoot them.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: So, take a deep breath, and hold your weapon firm. We're protecting Justice Lavinia, protecting the courthouse, and protecting ourselves.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: But, Eirene...
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Listen.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: The cheering. It's getting nearer and nearer.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: The parade will reach Court Square in just a few more minutes.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: How will the people interpret what they see? They're the ones who will pass judgment.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: The law needs only facts, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Eirene's voice is trembling, but the crossbow in her hand is firm. Suddenly, Lyudmila feels like she is looking at a stranger.
The beast masked-figures on one side, the truck drivers on the other, like they are standing on two sides of a river.
There is no weapon on the ground, only shattered boxes. The weapons are in their hands.
Everyone hears the sounds filling the air.
The rumbling of floats, impromptu band performance, the spirited yelling of acrobats... the parade draws ever closer.
Then, sounds that are fainter, but even more audible. The sound of guns being loaded and locked, Arts units being activated, crossbow safeties pins being unlocked...
There is nowhere to hide. There is nowhere to run.
No one has moved, yet. At the first shot, the dammed river will burst, and the tide of madness will wash over everything.
No one speaks. Nerves are wound to the very tightest. Everyone is listening to the sounds, and their own racing heartbeats.
A new day will dawn upon Nuova Volsinii soon.
But the night is long.
